Body:
self.cmd = (
    "%(pgm)s %(in_fqfn)s                                   -d ','                                             --fieldcnt 70                                      --quoting 'quote_none'                             --outgood %(outgood)s                              --outerr  %(outerr)s                         "
     % {'pgm': self.pgm, 'outgood': self.outgood_fqfn, 'outerr': self.
    outerr_fqfn, 'in_fqfn': self.std_7x7_fqfn})
print(self.cmd)
runner = envoy.run(self.cmd)
self.get_outputs(runner)
print(self.std_out)
print(self.std_err)
assert self.status_code == errno.EBADMSG
assert len(self.err_output) == 7
assert not self.good_output
orig_recs = []
for rec in self.err_output:
    fields = rec.split(',')
    assert len(fields) == 8
    orig_recs.append(','.join(fields[:7]))
assert orig_recs == self.data_7x7
